item.description:
Worried about gas prices? Dreading your first heating oil bill? Concerned about global warming and want to know what YOU can do? Join the Sierra Club and your friends and neighbors to have fun, enjoy a beautiful fall day, and learn about energy solutions. Together we can make a difference! Sierra Club members and supporters and everyone who cares about energy from the greater Boston area will gather to learn about ways to save energy and reduce our global warming emissions and to celebrate the many great achievements we have made already.

Volunteers Are Needed For This Event!
We need YOUR help to make this event successful! Can you help staff tables, hand out literature, and provide other volunteer tasks? No special skills are needed, but we do need you to arrive by 10:30am. RSVP to Carol Oldham (see below).

For more information, contact Carol Oldham at 617-423-5775 or carol.oldham@sierraclub.org.

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Sierra Club's Energy Solutions Day
